title: Excel/Word Slow Performance
description: Fix Microsoft Excel and Word running slowly or freezing.

steps.title: Disable Add-ins
steps.instruction: File → Options → Add-ins → Manage: COM Add-ins → Go → Uncheck all add-ins → OK → Restart application. Add-ins often cause slowness.

steps.title: Repair Office Installation
steps.instruction: Control Panel → Programs → Programs and Features → Microsoft Office → Change → Quick Repair (or Online Repair) → Repair.

steps.title: Disable Hardware Graphics Acceleration
steps.instruction: File → Options → Advanced → Display section → Check 'Disable hardware graphics acceleration' → OK → Restart application.

steps.title: Reduce File Size
steps.instruction: For large files: Remove unnecessary images, compress images (Pictures → Format → Compress Pictures), delete unused sheets/slides.

steps.title: Update Microsoft Office
steps.instruction: Open any Office app → File → Account → Update Options → Update Now. Keep Office updated for best performance.
